name: Trash Dash (Futuregames)
description:
Trash Dash, the game where you not only get to play as a flying robot – racing through a beautiful forest, zipping through intricate obstacles and getting as far as possible – but you also get to clean up the forest and use the trash as fuel to get even further!

Brought to you by TEAM 12

JOEL SCHERF  - Lead game designer, project lead

EMILY THORELL - Game designer

ALVA WÄPPLING - Lead artist

KARL RYGAARD - Artist

JENS SUNDQVIST - Lead programmer

MAX VENDEL - Programmer

LEON LASZLO - Lead QA

CHRISTIAN OJA - QA 

Controls

[A] - Left 

[D] - Right 

[W] - Up 

[S] - Down

You can also play the game using an Xbox-controller, but you will have to navigate the menu using the mouse.
